entries.content: Objections are just requests for more information, not rejections.
entries.notes: Encourages viewing objections as opportunities to educate rather than barriers.

entries.content: Address objections by providing clear, factual information to reassure the customer.
entries.notes: Uses industry knowledge to dispel myths about fuel quality.

entries.content: Stay professional and solution-focused when handling objections.
entries.notes: Emphasizes maintaining professionalism even in personal interactions.

entries.content: Explaining fuel quality standards to address skepticism about pricing.
entries.notes: Uses regulatory facts to build trust and counter objections.

entries.content: If you've got a problem and we offer a solution, the money will come anyway.
entries.notes: Highlights the value of solving real problems as a sales foundation.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
